name: Fire and Maneuver
description: Coordinated movement and suppressive fire tactics for battlefield mobility.

cards.title: Bounding Overwatch
cards.description: Alternating cover fire while moving towards an objective.
cards.bulletpoints: Move in pairs, suppress enemy positions, use cover effectively

cards.title: Flanking and Envelopment
cards.description: Executing a flanking maneuver to neutralize threats from an advantageous position.
cards.bulletpoints: Identify enemy weak points, coordinate flanking approach, maintain team communication
